# 零组文库

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lingzu-wenku
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lingzu-wenku
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lingzu-wenku
lingzu-wenku <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lingzu-wenku
lingzu-wenku <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
